snippet.title: 【UE5】The horror game that buzzed in Japan, we made it. (Part1)【Anji -Implication-】
snippet.description:
Hello, I am Bunbukuzu, a Japanese couple game creator!
This is Part 1 of a video where I talk about how we created the horror game "Implication" that buzzed on X (formerly Twitter) with 3,500 RP and 11,000 likes!

In this video, we will discuss the concept behind "Anji -Implication-" and the creation of the staircase that will be the stage for the project!

We don't speak English very well so sorry if the translation is difficult to understand.

We made this video so that people who are new to Bunbukuzu can also enjoy it :)


!! Notice !!
Anji -Implication-", a horror game created by Bunbukuzu, 
will be available on Steam on Jan 28 , 2024 at 12:00 AM (PST)!
Please add it to your Wishlist!

●"Anji -Implication-" Steam Store Page↓
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2759770/Anji_Implication/

●smash subscribe !↓
https://www.youtube.com/@bunbukuzu?sub_confirmation=1

Click here for the X (old Twitter ) account of Bunbukuzu.↓
●https://twitter.com/Bunbukuzu

#Anji #implication  #ue5 #indiegamedev #Horrorgame #ぶんぶくず #Bunbukuzu

Great music
Evan King
・20XX
・Tundra
・Scratch
・Neon
https://www.youtube.com/ContextSensitive
https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/

SE
・Dova-Syndrom
・On-Jin
・Otologic
・効果音ラボ
